By BattlecatRex on Sunday, February 2, 2003 - 06:56 am:

The President said that NASA would not be trashed. Its not that the President is a fan of Star Trek, its that the US can’t stop flying because of a treaty. A treaty has the same power as a law, and the INSS Treaty states that NASA has to do a lot more work on Alpha before they can stop. No time to mourn. ;(
